DOC.brief_title: Paclitaxel Capecitabine Treating Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine safety , response rate , efficacy combination therapy paclitaxel capecitabine first second line therapy woman metastatic breast cancer . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour day 1 capecitabine orally twice daily day 1-14 . Treatment repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow survival status every 3 month upon completion treatment . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 60 patient accrue study .
